# Role Specific Rules You only have to follow rules that apply to your job.
This includes if you get promoted to said job via HoP, borging, etc.
- [textlink="1. Cyborg / AI" link="RuleS1"] - [textlink="2. Passenger" link="RuleS2"] - [textlink="3. Security" link="RuleS3"] - [textlink="4. Command" link="RuleS4"] - [textlink="5. Insurgents" link="RuleS5"] - [textlink="6. Antagonists" link="RuleS6"]
